chapter.title: Process and Thread Functions
chapter.para: This chapter covers the available process and thread functions.

section.title: SysGetpid
section.para: This function uses the getpid() C API to perform the action.
Returns the current numerical process id.
section.programlisting:
/* get the current process id */
mypid = SysGetpid()

section.title: SysGetppid
section.para: Gets the parent process id of the current process.
This function uses the getppid() C API to perform the action.
Returns the current parent process id.
section.programlisting:
/* get the parent process id */
myppid = SysGetppid()

section.title: SysGettid
section.para: This function uses the pthread_self() C API to perform the action.
Returns the current numerical thread id.
section.programlisting:
/* get the current thread id */
mytid = SysGettid()

section.title: SysKill
section.para: Kill the specified process using the specified signal.
This function uses the kill() C API to perform the action.
Returns the return code from the C kill() API.
